DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the change of tumor size and serum cytokine in the patients who received cryotherapy for the renal tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Cryotherapy for Renal Tumors
DOC.criteria: The patients who have renal tumor less than 7 cm and receive cryotherapy The tumor size is larger than 7 cm The patients do not approve the surgery
